column1: Uchi////This was our first time coming to Uchi in Houston. The food was good
column2: however the service was not. Our water pitcher sat empty
column3: we were overcharged for some items and they didn't apologize when the mistake was pointed out. Lastly
column4: given that we were celebrating a birthday we expected some acknowledgement other than a "happy birthday" from the host. Not the spectacular experience expected for the high price of dining there.
